name: Heart Of The City
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam 30 - Downloading a Native build  is recommended 

Mac OS was built targeting Catalina w/ Intel Chips

Windows build version 0.3 may not load on some systems. Try version 0.2 if you have problems.  0.2 versions use GLES 2.

SliceGames is not in affiliation with Technos Japan or Nintendo.  Created for Godot Game Jam 30.  Some rights reserved where applicable.
